Package utilz

Class HelpMethods

java.lang.Object
utilz.HelpMethods
public class HelpMethods extends Object
Utility methods for various operations in the game.

  • Method Details

    • CanMoveHere

      public static boolean CanMoveHere(float x, float y, float width, float height, int[][] lvlData)
      Checks if an entity can move to the specified position on the level.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the entity.
      y - The y-coordinate of the entity.
      width - The width of the entity.
      height - The height of the entity.
      lvlData - The level data.
      Returns:
      True if the entity can move to the specified position, false otherwise.

    • IsProjectileHittingLevel

      public static boolean IsProjectileHittingLevel(Projectile p, int[][] lvlData)
      Checks if the specified projectile is hitting the level terrain.
      Parameters:
      p - The projectile to check.
      lvlData - The level data representing solidity of tiles.
      Returns:
      True if the projectile is hitting the level terrain, false otherwise.

    • IsTileSolid

      public static boolean IsTileSolid(int xTile, int yTile, int[][] lvlData)
      Checks if the tile at the specified coordinates is solid.
      Parameters:
      xTile - The x-coordinate of the tile.
      yTile - The y-coordinate of the tile.
      lvlData - The level data representing solidity of tiles.
      Returns:
      True if the tile is solid, false otherwise.

    • GetEntityXPosNextToWall

      public static float GetEntityXPosNextToWall(Rectangle2D.Float hitbox, float xSpeed)
      Calculates the x-coordinate where an entity should be positioned next to a wall based on its hitbox and horizontal speed.
      Parameters:
      hitbox - The hitbox of the entity.
      xSpeed - The horizontal speed of the entity.
      Returns:
      The x-coordinate where the entity should be positioned next to a wall.

    • GetEntityYPosUnderRoofOrAboveFloor

      public static float GetEntityYPosUnderRoofOrAboveFloor(Rectangle2D.Float hitbox, float airSpeed)
      Calculates the y-coordinate where an entity should be positioned under a roof or above the floor based on its hitbox and vertical speed.
      Parameters:
      hitbox - The hitbox of the entity.
      airSpeed - The vertical speed of the entity.
      Returns:
      The y-coordinate where the entity should be positioned under a roof or above the floor.

    • IsEntityOnFloor

      public static boolean IsEntityOnFloor(Rectangle2D.Float hitbox, int[][] lvlData)
      Checks if the entity represented by the given hitbox is on the floor.
      Parameters:
      hitbox - The hitbox of the entity.
      lvlData - The level data representing the map.
      Returns:
      true if the entity is on the floor, false otherwise.

    • IsFloor

      public static boolean IsFloor(Rectangle2D.Float hitbox, float xSpeed, int[][] lvlData)
      Checks if there is a floor beneath the entity represented by the given hitbox.
      Parameters:
      hitbox - The hitbox of the entity.
      xSpeed - The horizontal speed of the entity.
      lvlData - The level data representing the map.
      Returns:
      true if there is a floor beneath the entity, false otherwise.

    • CanCannonSeePlayer

      public static boolean CanCannonSeePlayer(int[][] lvlData, Rectangle2D.Float firstHitbox, Rectangle2D.Float secondHitbox, int yTile)
      Checks if a cannon has a clear line of sight to the player.
      Parameters:
      lvlData - The level data representing the map.
      firstHitbox - The hitbox of the first position of the cannon.
      secondHitbox - The hitbox of the second position of the cannon.
      yTile - The y-coordinate of the tile where the cannon is positioned.
      Returns:
      true if the cannon has a clear line of sight to the player, false otherwise.

    • IsAllTilesClear

      public static boolean IsAllTilesClear(int xStart, int xEnd, int y, int[][] lvlData)
      Checks if all tiles within a specified range along the x-axis at a given y-coordinate are clear.
      Parameters:
      xStart - The starting x-coordinate of the range (inclusive).
      xEnd - The ending x-coordinate of the range (exclusive).
      y - The y-coordinate of the tiles to check.
      lvlData - The level data representing the map.
      Returns:
      true if all tiles within the specified range are clear, false otherwise.

    • IsAllTilesWalkable

      public static boolean IsAllTilesWalkable(int xStart, int xEnd, int y, int[][] lvlData)
      Checks if all tiles within a specified range along the x-axis at a given y-coordinate are walkable.
      Parameters:
      xStart - The starting x-coordinate of the range (inclusive).
      xEnd - The ending x-coordinate of the range (exclusive).
      y - The y-coordinate of the tiles to check.
      lvlData - The level data representing the map.
      Returns:
      true if all tiles within the specified range are walkable, false otherwise.

    • IsSightClear

      public static boolean IsSightClear(int[][] lvlData, Rectangle2D.Float firstHitbox, Rectangle2D.Float secondHitbox, int yTile)
      Checks if there is a clear line of sight between two hitboxes at a specified y-coordinate.
      Parameters:
      lvlData - The level data representing the map.
      firstHitbox - The hitbox of the first entity.
      secondHitbox - The hitbox of the second entity.
      yTile - The y-coordinate at which to check for clear sight.
      Returns:
      true if there is a clear line of sight between the hitboxes, false otherwise.

    • GetLevelData

      public static int[][] GetLevelData(BufferedImage img)
      Converts the pixel data from an image to a 2D array representing the level map.
      Parameters:
      img - The image containing the level map.
      Returns:
      A 2D array representing the level map, where each element corresponds to a tile in the map.

    • GetCrabs

      public static ArrayList<Crabby> GetCrabs(BufferedImage img)
      Extracts the positions of crabs from an image representing the level map.
      Parameters:
      img - The image containing the level map with crab positions.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing Crabby objects representing the positions of crabs in the level.

    • GetPlayerSpawn

      public static Point GetPlayerSpawn(BufferedImage img)
      Finds the spawn point for the player in the level map image.
      Parameters:
      img - The image representing the level map.
      Returns:
      A Point object representing the spawn coordinates of the player.

    • GetPotions

      public static ArrayList<Potion> GetPotions(BufferedImage img)
      Extracts potion objects from the level map image.
      Parameters:
      img - The image representing the level map.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing Potion objects representing the potions extracted from the image.

    • GetContainers

      public static ArrayList<GameContainer> GetContainers(BufferedImage img)
      Extracts container objects from the level map image.
      Parameters:
      img - The image representing the level map.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing GameContainer objects representing the containers extracted from the image.

    • GetSpikes

      public static ArrayList<Spike> GetSpikes(BufferedImage img)
      Extracts spike objects from the level map image.
      Parameters:
      img - The image representing the level map.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing Spike objects representing the spikes extracted from the image.

    • GetCannons

      public static ArrayList<Cannon> GetCannons(BufferedImage img)
      Extracts cannon objects from the level map image.
      Parameters:
      img - The image representing the level map.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing Cannon objects representing the cannons extracted from the image.
